text:
Ticket Evolution | New York, NY | ONSITE & REMOTE
We are the NASDAQ of the ticketing industry. We have millions of tickets available in our marketplace and don't own a single one. We are small, growing, and profitable. This is an opportunity to join a stable startup.
We are looking for Senior level experience in Ruby/Rails and/or Node. Experience with scaling, microservices, and ecommerce is strongly preferred. Our API is hit over 1K time per second on average.
Please contact me at [hackerjobs - AT - ticketevolution.com]
